title: Cashier's checks and money orders
personalDataVerified: Payee name, payment amount, issuing institution name, check/order number, issue date
personalDataVisible: Check status (honored/dishonored/cancelled). Link to issuing bank system (payees and merchants, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake cashier's checks which are common in fraud schemes. Domain binding verifies issuing bank. Real-time verification before accepting payment prevents overpayment scams. Prevents check fraud where fake cashiers check clears initially then reverses days later exposing victim to loss. Critical for high-value transactions where cashier's check fraud causes significant losses.
